attributes.title: DO NOT AND I REPEAT DO NOT DOWNLOAD
SAVE ME AND BARRON
attributes.review: One day trump and the fbi broke into my house DEMANDING I go vote for him. And obviously I said no because who wants to support that racist bitch🖕Anyways after I said no HE TOOK MY CAT AND PUT IT IN THE OVEN AND KILLED IT😤 my parents tried to kick him out of the house but the fbi killed them because they also said no to voting for him.💔 after I saw my parents get MURDERED in front of me I decided to use my gifted powers and kill trump.🔫 I tried to kill the fbi too but they all attacked me to the ground and arrested me and took me to this random government facility and locked🔒me down in the basement but lucky someone forgot their phone📱down here. So I’m writing to you guys to tell you what’s happening to me. I don’t have that much time⏳but PLEASE if you guys see this that means you’ve been chosen to save me from this facility. But if I get saved we can’t leave Barron here because he’s also here with me. SO GUYS PLEASE HELP US ESCAPE!🙏

attributes.title: This app sucked
attributes.review: I just wanted to make America great again and I download this app and i found out all my emails and texts were sent to the gov

attributes.title: This app is not good
attributes.review: I downloaded the app but it was malfunctioning and I do not recommend this to anyone not even for my neighbor who loves the president I just don’t think the app is trust worthy I did not work this it my seven time resetting it I really just think the app is a fail and a total fake ask me everyone I know hates that game and for the same problem too. This is what I think complete garbage

attributes.title: kicked my dog
attributes.review: after i downloaded this app, trump came to my house and kicked my dog :(

attributes.title: The worst app
attributes.review: Terrible app, glitching and lagging constantly, not worth the 1.5 seconds it took to download. Tried resetting but then the app just crashed. This app is broken!

attributes.title: i’d rather throw my phone in the ocean than keep this app
